message.content:
{"id": "13189", "title": "Bug 13189 - Refactoring: Deleting fields context menu is overridden by message dialog", 
"description": "On LinuxMotif and w2k, when trying to delete a field using the context menu, the menu is overridden by a message dialog.", 
"OB": "Open the context menu by right-clicking on a field and select the 'Delete' option.", 
"EB": "Instead of showing the context menu, a message dialog asking if I want to delete the getter/setter as well is immediately displayed.", 
"SR": "The context menu should be displayed properly when trying to delete a field, without being overridden by the message dialog."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '13189', 'title': 'Bug 13189Refactoring  deleting fields  context menu is overriden by message dialog', 'description': '20020409I on LinuxMotif and w2k:1. Setup JUnit2. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'Observe: No context menu is shown, instead, it asks me right awayif I want to delete the getter/setter as well. ', 'SR': ''}
